question.title: Using .filter and Set combination instead of .distinct to find unique items in java stream?
question.body:
I am contemplating using this setup instead of distinct to find unique items.

Set<String> seen = ConcurrentHashMap.newKeySet();
List<String> names = people.stream()
                           .map(Person::getName)
                           .filter(seen::add)
                           .collect(Collectors.toList());

Does it achieve better parallellization and performance this way by converting distinct to a stateless operation?
